mapper.select: select COUNT(DISTINCT device_mac)as boothTotal, COUNT(DISTINCT beacon_mac) as boothMemberTotal, ROUND((COUNT(*) / COUNT(DISTINCT beacon_mac)),0) as boothstayTimeAvg from ${tableName}

select b.unit_id as unitId,log.device_mac,device_name,booth_location as device_address,booth_id, booth_name,b.created_time, count(log.device_mac) as duration, (count(log.device_mac) / count(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac)) as durationAvg from ${tableName} log left join tb_wa_booth b on b.device_mac = log.device_mac and b.unit_id = log.unit_id where b.unit_id = #{unitId} GROUP BY b.device_mac ORDER BY duration DESC,durationAvg DESC

select bo.booth_id as booth_id, COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac) as bemberTotal from tb_wa_booth bo LEFT JOIN ${tableName} log ON log.unit_id = bo.unit_id and log.device_mac = bo.device_mac where log.unit_id = #{unitId} GROUP BY bo.booth_id
mapper.update:
update tb_report_visit_log_booth_result set
booth_total = #{indexData.boothTotal},
booth_member_total = #{indexData.boothMemberTotal},
booth_stay_time_avg = #{indexData.boothstayTimeAvg},
last_updated_time = NOW() where unit_id = #{unitId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.unit_id FROM tb_report_permission p INNER JOIN tb_event_template e ON p.unit_id = e.unit_id WHERE permission_level = 'S' AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) BETWEEN e.start_time and e.end_time

select DISTINCT u.beacon_mac as beaconMac, contact_id as contactId, member_name as memberName, member_id as memberId, company_name as companyName, postion_code as postionCode, industry, city as region, u.unit_id as unitId, count(DISTINCT log.device_mac) as boothTotal, count(log.device_mac) as durationTimeTotal from tb_cm_member u left join ${tableName} log on u.beacon_mac = log.beacon_mac AND u.unit_id = log.unit_id Where u.unit_id = #{unitId} GROUP BY u.beacon_mac Order BY boothTotal DESC,durationTimeTotal DESC

select DISTINCT log.device_mac,time_minute as stay_time,date_add(calculate_time, interval -13 hour) as leave_time, b.booth_name,postion_code,company_name from tb_report_visit_log log left join tb_cm_member u on u.beacon_mac = log.beacon_mac AND u.unit_id = log.unit_id left join tb_wa_booth b on b.device_mac = log.device_mac AND b.unit_id = log.unit_id Where log.unit_id =#{unitId} and log.beacon_mac = #{beaconMac} ORDER BY calculate_time,log.device_mac

select b.booth_name as maxStayTime from tb_visit_activity_log log left join tb_wa_booth b on b.device_mac = log.device_mac AND b.unit_id = log.unit Where log.unit = #{unitId} and log.beacon_mac = #{beaconMac} Group by log.device_mac Order by sum(stay_time) DESC LIMIT 1
select beacon_mac,member_name from tb_cm_member Where unit_id = #{unitId}
select count(DISTINCT beacon_mac) from tb_report_visit_log Where unit_id = #{unitId}

select c.device_mac from tb_wa_beacon_calculate c INNER join tb_cm_member m on c.unit = m.unit_id and m.beacon_id = #{beaconId} Where c.unit = #{unitId} and c.beacon_mac = m.beacon_mac and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(window_end) BETWEEN (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) -10 - #{minutes} * 60) AND (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) + 10) Order by c.window_start DESC,c.rssi limit 0,1

select DISTINCT m.unit_id as unitId,m.beacon_id as beaconId,m.member_name as memberName, m.wechat_head_img_url as wechatHeadImgUrl,m.postion_code as postionCode,min(c.rssi) as rssi from tb_wa_beacon_calculate c INNER join tb_cm_member m on c.unit = m.unit_id and m.beacon_mac = c.beacon_mac Where c.unit = #{unitId} and c.device_mac = #{deviceMac} and m.beacon_id != #{beaconId} and c.rssi <= #{rssi} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(window_end) BETWEEN (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) -10 - #{minutes} * 60) AND (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) + 10) GROUP BY m.unit_id,m.beacon_id ,m.member_name,m.wechat_head_img_url,m.postion_code Order by c.rssi

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac) as activeUserNumber, ROUND((COUNT(log.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT m.beacon_mac)),0) interactionTotalNumber, ROUND((COUNT(log.beacon_mac)/ COUNT(DISTINCT m.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac)),0) as interactionAvgNumber, (COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT m.beacon_mac)) as interactionPartInRate from tb_sys_behavior_log log INNER JOIN tb_cm_member m ON log.unit_id = m.unit_id where log.unit_id = #{unitId} and log.behavior_id = 1

SELECT b.behavior_name behaviorName, COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac) as partInNumber, (COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT m.beacon_mac)) as interactionPartInRate, ROUND((COUNT(log.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT m.beacon_mac)),0) as effectiveInteractionNumber, ROUND((COUNT(log.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT m.beacon_mac) / COUNT(DISTINCT log.beacon_mac)),0) as perInteraction from tb_sys_behavior_log log LEFT JOIN tb_sys_behavior b ON log.behavior_id = b.id INNER JOIN tb_cm_member m ON log.unit_id = m.unit_id where log.unit_id = #{unitId} GROUP BY behavior_id
